ac: 20, touch 17, flat-footed 14 (+3 armor, +5 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 size)
other_gear: mwk studded leather, mwk dogslicers (2), shortbow with 20 arrows, tindertwigs (4), 64 gp
feats: Dodge, Improved Initiative, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Finesse

sections.body: During Combat A firestarter avoids melee, instead making sneak attacks with its bow and using alchemist's fire or flaming arrows to start fires, cause panic, and trap opponents. It saves its goblin skull bomb for a weak opponent, hoping to kill that foe and craft a new goblin skull bomb from the corpse.
sections.name: Tactics

special_qualities: rogue talents (finesse rogue, surprise attack), trapfinding +2, weapon familiarity
name: Goblin Firestarter
skills: Acrobatics +13, Climb +8, Disable Device +13, Escape Artist +13, Perception +9, Sleight of Hand +13, Stealth +17, Swim +8
combat_gear: +1 flaming arrows (5), goblin skull bomb, potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of jump, alchemist's fire (4), smokesticks (2), thunderstones (2)
